Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: This is Main Street, the center of most of the activities in Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: One of the most attractive entertainment centers in the entire village is the Sportsman's Arena, located just to the west. A great banner across the top indicates there are three arenas going at all times, even one for the kids. It's a family affair, with door prizes and a set of dishes to the lucky winner.
